english:
Kledering Weather Report for 2025-10-11

Temperature: Mild with a range of 12.2°C to 16.4°C. Apparent temperatures (feels-like) were cooler, especially in the morning (as low as 8.9°C).

Wind: Moderate to strong westerly winds (avg. 18.1 km/h), with gusts up to 41.4 km/h in the early morning. Winds decreased in the afternoon.

UV Index: Moderate (3.5 at peak), requiring sun protection during midday (11 AM–3 PM).

Precipitation: None expected (0.0 mm). Cloud cover remained high (73–100%), with minimal sunshine (2.5 hours).

Visibility: Good (45.5 km average).

Outdoor Activity Recommendations

  • Morning (7–9 AM): Cool with strong winds (18–20 km/h). Not ideal for running/biking due to wind chill (8.9–10.1°C).
  • Afternoon (4–8 PM): Best window. Warmer (14.8–16.4°C), winds easing (11–18 km/h), and UV decreasing. Ideal for outdoor sports.

No precipitation expected, but high cloud cover may reduce visibility for long-distance activities.
